The Team


Evan Hall

Co-Founder

4+ years managing fisheries programs and marketing a $60million annual portfolio of fish and wildlife products with the Ontario Government, has a BScH in Environmental Science and an MBA from Queen’s University

Dominique Bureau

Co-Founder

30 years of experience in animal production and aquaculture with a Bachelor’s degree in agronomy, a Master’s degree in Animal Science and a Doctoral degree in Nutritional Sciences. World leading expert on nutrition of aquaculture species, mathematical nutritional modeling applied to aquaculture species and on the development of tools and resources for aquaculture producers and feed manufacturers. Member of the high profile US National Research Council Committee on Nutrient Requirements of Fish and Shrimp (2009-2011).

Duncan Gillis

Co-Founder

10+ years of development with software development in Data/Analytics tech companies in the gaming industry and has a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science and Finance.

The Wittaya Aqua Platform

Wittaya Aqua is a production management platform that increases operational efficiency through aggregation and analysis of the huge volume of data already collected by aquaculture operations. The platform is powered by advanced mathematical and nutritional models and creates value by optimizing feeding practices, reducing uncertainty in forecasting production, and tracking commercially important benchmarks.

Platform Features

Versatility

The platform is easy to use, comprehensive and adaptable to a wide variety of aquaculture species; trout, tilapia, shrimp, crab, you name it

Improved Production

Objective, robust and credible computation of performance metrics

Robust

Dynamic and insightful simulation of animal inventory

Superior Forecasting

Superior harvest forecasting, including weight distribution

Our unique approach contrasts different estimates computed by the aquaculture operation with Wittaya’s own robust algorithms
